parameters:
Upon entering the cathedral, there were many hostages. No
guards were in sight.
\n<Anatose resident>"Ah... to think help has come!"

\n<Roselitte>"Quietly. Don't raise your voice too much. Are all the
hostages here?"
\n<Anatose resident>"Yes, I believe everyone here is accounted for."
\n<Roselitte>"Are there any injured or sick among you?"

\n<Anatose resident>"There are no injured, but there's an elderly person in the
back."
\n<Ameria>"I can take a look, please lead the way."
\n<Anatose resident>"Ah, you're a Sister, thank goodness. This way, please."

\n<Roselitte>"Does anyone know anything about Deorc? It's believed he's
taken imperial dignitaries hostage. Have you heard anything
about that?"

\n<Anatose resident>"This Deorc, you say? We've been here since we got left
behind..."

\n<Roselitte>"He's the mastermind who uses monsters and caused this
turmoil... It seems you truly know nothing."
\n<Roselitte>"Lyric, what do you make of this?"
Ignoring Roselitte's voice, Lyric walked towards the altar.

\n<Lyric>"...No? I just really don't like this thing," Lyric said,
glaring at the altar.
\n<Roselitte>"Well, you are a demon after all."

\n<Lyric>"I'm a demon. So when I was at Ameria's church, I always
felt uncomfortable...," Lyric climbed onto the altar and
turned around.

As she was speaking, Roselitte and Lyric turned towards the
entrance.

As Roselitte shouted, the entrance of the church collapsed
with a loud noise.

\n<Anatose resident>"Aaahhh! Save us!","Eeeek! It's all over!!","Aaahhh
Mommyyyyy!!"
\n<Ameria>"Everyone, this way! To the back! Hurry!"

A monster attacked Ameria as she was helping the hostages
evacuate.
\n<Roselitte>"Take them to the back of the church! Quickly!"

Roselitte mustered her strength and swept away the large
monster with a single swing.

\n<Lyric>"--Phew♪ Impressive, you're doing great. Do we even need to
be here?" Lyric whistled and lined up beside Roselitte.

\n<Roselitte>"Hehe... Unfortunately, I've already used up all my
strength."
\n<Lyric>"Haha. What, I can't believe you'd say something like that."
Ameria came running back at a trot.
\n<Ameria>"I've evacuated everyone to the back room!"
\n<Roselitte>"Leave the front to me. Don't miss the signal."

The monster went berserk, thrashing its large body around
inside the grand cathedral.

The monster let out a death throes scream and smashed the
sanctuary of the grand cathedral.
Roselitte leaped forward, sword raised high.
Roselitte plunged her sword into the monster.
The monster howled one last time and then quieted down.

Ameria rushed over to Roselitte, who had fallen to her
knees.

\n<Roselitte>"But... to go on such a rampage. What grudge did it have
against the church?"
\n<Ameria>"Yeah, really... Of all places, the altar--huh?"

When they looked towards the altar, Lyric was moving aside
the collapsed rubble.

\n<Lyric>"...Both of you, come take a look. There's something
interesting here."

Roselitte and Ameria walked over to Lyric with puzzled
expressions.

\n<Lyric>"...Ameria. It seems like this is one of the church's
secrets."

Where the altar stood, there was a staircase leading
underground.
\n<Ameria>"I-I had no idea... that something like this was here..."

\n<Lyric>"That's not all. I can sense the presence of monsters from
inside... along with my magic."
\n<Lyric>"'The answer' lies within. What will you do, Roselitte?"
\n<Roselitte>"...Proceeding may not be the wisest decision. However--"

Roselitte looked towards the back of the cathedral, where
the hostages were hiding.

\n<Roselitte>"'The bait is now the hostages.' If we leave now, their
lives are in danger."

\n<Lyric>"--Nfufu♪ If you want us to come with you, just say the
word, okay?♪"
Roselitte looked at Lyric. Lyric shrugged in response.
地下牢を抜けると"アナトス大聖堂"の内部に潜入した。
ひとまず３人は脱出に向けて本堂を目指す。
本堂にするとリリックが違和感に気付いた。
"教会は隠し事が多い"という言葉を思い出し燭台を調べると、
そこには新たな隠し通路が発見された。
